title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agents of Change: AI & People Powering the Future of Work (AIM128)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 变革推动者：AI与人类共同驱动未来工作 (AIM128)
abstract: According to research by Pearson and ServiceNow, by 2030 more than 8 million jobs in the US will be impacted by agentic AI. Agents will work alongside people, augmenting human capability, reshaping roles, and ushering in a new era of intelligent teamwork. The result: new ways of working, new roles, and a fundamental shift in how organizations build and apply skills, particularly in the tech sector. In this session, Pearson and ServiceNow will discuss the findings of their Workforce Skills Forecast, exploring how agentic AI will transform the world of work, humans and AI will collaborate, and how organizations need to reimagine learning and skills in the age of agentic AI. This presentation is brought to you by Pearson, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 根据Pearson和ServiceNow的研究，到2030年，美国将有超过800万个工作岗位受到智能体AI的影响。智能体将与人类并肩工作，增强人类能力，重塑工作角色，并开启智能协作的新时代。结果是：新的工作方式、新的角色，以及组织构建和应用技能方式的根本性转变，特别是在技术领域。在本次会议中，Pearson和ServiceNow将讨论其劳动力技能预测的研究结果，探讨智能体AI如何改变工作世界、人类与AI如何协作，以及组织如何在智能体AI时代重新构想学习和技能。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Pearson为您呈现。
